Which of the following fits the definition: _____ is used to assess accuracy, availability, and use of data for Data Quality.

>>Select the one correct answer<<

(x) A. Data Verification Surveys 
( ) B. Data Desk Review 

[explanation]
Data verification surveys are used to assess the access, availability and use of data for Data Quality. 
[explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Which of the following fits the definition: _____ is used to assess accuracy, availability, and use of data for Data Quality.
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select the one correct answer

div.p: Data verification surveys are used to assess the access, availability and use of data for Data Quality.
